aldarian-gauntlet.name: Aldarian Gauntlet
aldarian-gauntlet.description: A rare artifact. This battle-worn gauntlet shows heavy use.

aldarian-sword.name: Aldarian Sword
aldarian-sword.description: An uncommon artifact. A worn military sword, likely from the War of the Lilies.

aldarian-war-banner.name: Aldarian War Banner
aldarian-war-banner.description: A rare artifact. Emblazoned with the royal crest of Aldaria.

family-crest-pendant.name: Family Crest Pendant
family-crest-pendant.description: An uncommon artifact. Once widely adopted in Aldaria, pendants were given to family members who were leaving home for the first time.

lost-crown-of-aldaria.name: Lost Crown of Aldaria
lost-crown-of-aldaria.description: A legendary artifact. Could this be the crown that was lost after the Caldosian Empire's invasion?

caldosian-breastplate.name: Caldosian Breastplate
caldosian-breastplate.description: A rare artifact. This magnificent breastplate is so ornate, it was likely used for ceremonial purposes.

caldosian-drinking-horn.name: Caldosian Drinking Horn
caldosian-drinking-horn.description: A rare artifact. Drinking horns were usually passed down through the family line.

caldosian-emperor-bust.name: Caldosian Emperor Bust
caldosian-emperor-bust.description: An uncommon artifact. The bust of a Caldosian Emperor. It's not clear which one.

caldosian-sword.name: Caldosian Sword
caldosian-sword.description: An uncommon artifact. An imperial officer's sword from the early days of the Caldosian Empire.

statuette-of-caldarus.name: Statuette of Caldarus
statuette-of-caldarus.description: A legendary artifact. There seems to have been a subset of the empire that once worshiped Caldarus...

alda-bronze-sword.name: Alda Bronze Sword
alda-bronze-sword.description: A rare artifact. Its intricate carvings and blue-green patina give this sword an otherworldly appearance.

alda-clay-pot.name: Alda Clay Pot
alda-clay-pot.description: An uncommon artifact. Made from rich river clay, a faded pattern can still be seen. Once used by the Alda people to store food.

alda-feather-pendant.name: Alda Feather Pendant
alda-feather-pendant.description: An uncommon artifact. Once used in marriage proposals, beautifully designed.

alda-gem-bracelet.name: Alda Gem Bracelet
alda-gem-bracelet.description: A legendary artifact. Non-local gems suggest the Alda had trading partners across the sea.

alda-mural-tablet.name: Alda Mural Tablet
alda-mural-tablet.description: A rare artifact. Depicts a scene of the Mistrian coast, as seen hundreds of years ago.

ancient-crystal-goblet.name: Ancient Crystal Goblet
ancient-crystal-goblet.description: A rare artifact. Elegant and sturdy, this goblet was likely used during Witch Queen rituals.

ancient-gold-coin.name: Ancient Gold Coin
ancient-gold-coin.description: An uncommon artifact. Etched with the outline of the Witch Queen on one side, and a magnificent tower on the other.

ancient-horn-circlet.name: Ancient Horn Circlet
ancient-horn-circlet.description: A rare artifact. A horn circlet from the age of the Witch Queens. Was this a fashion accessory or did it serve a greater purpose?

ancient-royal-scepter.name: Ancient Royal Scepter
ancient-royal-scepter.description: A legendary artifact. A Royal Scepter with the head of a dragon. The symbol of the Witch Queen's authority.

ancient-stone-lantern.name: Ancient Stone Lantern
ancient-stone-lantern.description: An uncommon artifact. An impossibly delicate stone lantern from the age of the Witch Queens. It still retains an ethereal glow from within.

amber-trapped-insect.name: Amber Trapped Insect
amber-trapped-insect.description: An uncommon artifact. It's noticeably bigger than today's insects.

fossilized-egg.name: Fossilized Egg
fossilized-egg.description: A rare artifact. What could be inside?

meteorite.name: Meteorite
meteorite.description: A legendary artifact. There's no telling how long ago it fell...

tiny-dinosaur-skeleton.name: Tiny Dinosaur Skeleton
tiny-dinosaur-skeleton.description: A rare artifact. Definitely not just a lizard.

trilobite-fossil.name: Trilobite Fossil
trilobite-fossil.description: An uncommon artifact. Too many legs, but still kinda cute.

black-tablet.name: Black Tablet
black-tablet.description: An uncommon artifact. Made of a strange metal, it's not clear what this is for.

completely-wrong-map.name: Completely Wrong Map
completely-wrong-map.description: An uncommon artifact. A badly faded map that appears to show a landmass where the Western Bay now lies.

muttering-cube.name: Muttering Cube
muttering-cube.description: An uncommon artifact. This device emits a low hiss most of the time, and occasionally what sounds like voices from far away.

unknown-dragon-statuette.name: Unknown Dragon Statuette
unknown-dragon-statuette.description: An uncommon artifact. This doesn't appear to be Caldarus.

weightless-stone.name: Weightless Stone
weightless-stone.description: An uncommon artifact. This black stone appears otherworldly in origin. It has no weight, and will roll around from the slightest breeze.

coin-lump.name: Coin Lump
coin-lump.description: An uncommon artifact. A mass of old coins, fused together by time.

giant-fish-scale.name: Giant Fish Scale
giant-fish-scale.description: An uncommon artifact. Can't imagine what fish this came from.

rubber-fish.name: Rubber Fish
rubber-fish.description: An uncommon artifact. How did this get in the water in the first place?

rusted-treasure-chest.name: Rusted Treasure Chest
rusted-treasure-chest.description: An uncommon artifact. Looks quite valuable, a shame it can't be opened.

water-sphere.name: Water Sphere
water-sphere.description: An uncommon artifact. You're not sure why, but it won't pop.

criminal-confession.name: Criminal Confession
criminal-confession.description: An uncommon artifact. Too bad the pages are fused together.

mermaid's-comb.name: Mermaid's Comb
mermaid's-comb.description: An uncommon artifact. Looks suspiciously like a fork.

rainbow-seaweed.name: Rainbow Seaweed
rainbow-seaweed.description: An uncommon artifact. Can only be found floating in the current, no one seems to know where it grows.

rock-with-a-hole.name: Rock with a Hole
rock-with-a-hole.description: An uncommon artifact. Seems to be naturally formed.

rusted-shield.name: Rusted Shield
rusted-shield.description: An uncommon artifact. A very old shield with an unusual design.

diamond-backed-mirror.name: Diamond-backed Mirror
diamond-backed-mirror.description: A rare artifact. The use of diamond here feels impractical.

flint-arrowhead.name: Flint Arrowhead
flint-arrowhead.description: An uncommon artifact. Likely lost during a hunt.

obsidian-blade.name: Obsidian Blade
obsidian-blade.description: A rare artifact. The artifact is still dangerously sharp.

shortcut-scroll.name: Shortcut Scroll
shortcut-scroll.description: A legendary artifact. The scroll appears to show a quick and easy route to the bottom of the Mines, but you don't recognize any of the paths.

stone-horse.name: Stone Horse
stone-horse.description: An uncommon artifact. Carefully carved and very cute.

miner's-helmet.name: Miner's Helmet
miner's-helmet.description: A rare artifact. There is a worn away name on it that ends with the letter L...

miner's-pickaxe.name: Miner's Pickaxe
miner's-pickaxe.description: A common artifact. It's in pretty good condition despite its age.

miner's-rucksack.name: Miner's Rucksack
miner's-rucksack.description: An uncommon artifact. It seems to have been down in the Mines a long time.

miner's-slab.name: Miner's Slab
miner's-slab.description: An uncommon artifact. It appears to warn of pitfalls ahead.

tin-lunchbox.name: Tin Lunchbox
tin-lunchbox.description: A common artifact. Sadly, it's empty.

crab-statue.name: Crab Statue
crab-statue.description: A rare artifact. This delicately crafted statue almost seems alive.

dense-water.name: Dense Water
dense-water.description: An uncommon artifact. This water is so dense that it holds its shape even in air.

starlight-coral.name: Starlight Coral
starlight-coral.description: A common artifact. This piece of coral glimmers as if reflecting starlight.

stone-shell.name: Stone Shell
stone-shell.description: A common artifact. When you hold it to your ear, you can hear the sound of water flowing through deep caves.

tidestone.name: Tidestone
tidestone.description: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of stone appears to grow and shrink slightly along with the tides.

earth-infused-stone.name: Earth-infused Stone
earth-infused-stone.description: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of rock has taken on elemental qualities of earth.

faceted-rock-gem.name: Faceted Rock Gem
faceted-rock-gem.description: A uncommon artifact. Despite its mesmerizing, gem-like appearance, it's just a piece of rock.

really-round-rock.name: Really Round Rock
really-round-rock.description: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is unnaturally round.

rock-statue.name: Rock Statue
rock-statue.description: A rare artifact. This naturally formed stone appears to be in the shape of a human, but... surely it's just a coincidence.

seriously-square-stone.name: Seriously Square Stone
seriously-square-stone.description: A common artifact. This naturally formed stone is a perfect square, a true delight for a rock connoisseur.

fire-crystal.name: Fire Crystal
fire-crystal.description: A common Lava Caves artifact. This crystal has been imbued by the essence of fire.

rainbow-geode.name: Rainbow Geode
rainbow-geode.description: An uncommon Lava Caves artifact. This incredible geode is formed of many different gems, all fused together.

red-obsidian.name: Red Obsidian
red-obsidian.description: An uncommon Lava Caves artifact. This chunk of obsidian has a streak of red running through it.

tiny-volcano.name: Tiny Volcano
tiny-volcano.description: A rare Lava Caves artifact. This geological formation looks a lot like a volcano, except... tiny.

warm-rock.name: Warm Rock
warm-rock.description: A common Lava Caves artifact. This rock is ordinary in appearance, but it remains perpetually warm to the touch.

ritual-beads.name: Ritual Beads
ritual-beads.description: An uncommon artifact. Running these beads through your hand evokes a feeling of serenity.

ritual-chalice.name: Ritual Chalice
ritual-chalice.description: An uncommon artifact. This ornate chalice was presumably used during ancient rituals.

ritual-incense-burner.name: Ritual Incense Burner
ritual-incense-burner.description: An uncommon artifact. The faint scent of incense still clings to this ancient burner.

ritual-scepter.name: Ritual Scepter
ritual-scepter.description: A rare artifact. This ritual scepter was likely used by Dragon Priestesses during rituals.

ritual-tablet.name: Ritual Tablet
ritual-tablet.description: A rare artifact. This tablet has a series of pictographs that show how to perform a ritual. It appears that one of the figures is a dragon.

mist-crystal.name: Mist Crystal
mist-crystal.description: An uncommon artifact. A strange hollow crystal. If you put your ear to it, you can hear a howling wind.

mist-flute.name: Mist Flute
mist-flute.description: A rare artifact. Through unknown means and at random times, this flute will play a haunting melody.

mist-scroll.name: Mist Scroll
mist-scroll.description: A rare artifact. The words on this scroll are illegible, due to its constantly shifting lines.

misty-black-mirror.name: Misty Black Mirror
misty-black-mirror.description: An uncommon artifact. A black mirror, filled with mist, that thrums with magical power.

misty-feather-quill.name: Misty Feather Quill
misty-feather-quill.description: An uncommon artifact. This ethereal quill begins to tremble when placed near paper.

vintage-brush.name: Vintage Brush
vintage-brush.description: A rare artifact. This cute vintage tool was used to pet farm animals in years past.

vintage-cow-bell.name: Vintage Cow Bell
vintage-cow-bell.description: A legendary artifact. This vintage bell would have been used to call cows home in bygone years.

vintage-hammer.name: Vintage Hammer
vintage-hammer.description: An uncommon artifact. This vintage wooden hammer was used to break rocks before pickaxes were commonplace.

vintage-sickle.name: Vintage Sickle
vintage-sickle.description: An uncommon artifact. This vintage sickle was used by past generations to turn grass into fodder.

vintage-watering-can.name: Vintage Watering Can
vintage-watering-can.description: An uncommon artifact. This vintage watering can was popular among farmers back in the day.

perfect-copper-ore.name: Perfect Copper Ore
perfect-copper-ore.description: An uncommon artifact. This large chunk of pure copper ore is worthy of display.

perfect-gold-ore.name: Perfect Gold Ore
perfect-gold-ore.description: A rare artifact. This gold ore is incredibly large and splendid.

perfect-iron-ore.name: Perfect Iron Ore
perfect-iron-ore.description: An uncommon artifact. This chunk of iron is too magnificent to simply melt down.

perfect-mistril-ore.name: Perfect Mistril Ore
perfect-mistril-ore.description: A rare artifact. This mistril ore is incredibly large and splendid.

perfect-silver-ore.name: Perfect Silver Ore
perfect-silver-ore.description: An uncommon artifact. The size and sheen on this piece of silver is a work of art.

perfect-diamond.name: Perfect Diamond
perfect-diamond.description: A rare artifact. This diamond is incredibly large and splendid.

perfect-emerald.name: Perfect Emerald
perfect-emerald.description: An uncommon artifact. An emerald of this clarity would gain nothing from being worked further.

perfect-pink-diamond.name: Perfect Pink Diamond
perfect-pink-diamond.description: A rare artifact. This pink diamond is incredibly large and splendid.

perfect-ruby.name: Perfect Ruby
perfect-ruby.description: A rare artifact. This ruby is incredibly large and splendid.

perfect-sapphire.name: Perfect Sapphire
perfect-sapphire.description: A rare artifact. This unusually large sapphire seems to glow from within.

crystal-apple.name: Crystal Apple
crystal-apple.description: A rare artifact. Appears to have been infused with essence.

fossilized-mandrake-root.name: Fossilized Mandrake Root
fossilized-mandrake-root.description: A legendary artifact. Thankfully, it's fossilized.

gathering-basket.name: Gathering Basket
gathering-basket.description: An uncommon artifact. Still smells faintly of Bell Berries.

metal-leaf.name: Metal Leaf
metal-leaf.description: A rare artifact. So detailed, it's not clear if it was grown or crafted.

petrified-wood.name: Petrified Wood
petrified-wood.description: An uncommon artifact. Incredibly old and beautiful.

clay.name: Clay
clay.description: A small lump of clay. Used in a variety of crafting recipes.

peat.name: Peat
peat.description: A brick of compressed organic matter, commonly burned as fuel. Used as a crafting material.

shard-mass.name: Shard Mass
shard-mass.description: A large mass of shards originating from unknown artifacts. Used as a crafting material.

shards.name: Shards
shards.description: Shards originating from unknown artifacts. Used as a crafting material.

sod.name: Sod
sod.description: A square of cut earth. Used as a crafting material.
